name: Snow Cap
description:
Snow Cap

It is simple arcade game, requiring observation and efficient avoidance of obstacles. You will be playing as Snowman, your task is to collect caps to open the passage to next level while avoiding obstacles.

Game have 5 levels. Resolution is 1920x1080.

The game was created as a challenge to create a simple game in less than 24 hours from scratch. I hope it will give players some challenges to complete it. Initially, after each player's death, it was to suppose to start from the beginning of level 1, but  it could be too hard so it starts at the level that you have screwed up. I was able to finish the challenge in 17h. 

I hope you like it.
